plot: It's a beautiful spring day in Central Park -- the sun is shining, birds are singing, flowers are in bloom. It's the ideal setting for an attractive young couple to have... the most frustrating date imaginable.
title: A Lovely Day for a Walk
plot_es: It's a beautiful spring day in Central Park -- the sun is shining, birds are singing, flowers are in bloom. It's the ideal setting for an attractive young couple to have... the most frustrating date imaginable.
